#â€‹491 â€” May 19, 2021 | Read on the web

Five Steps to Faster Web Fonts â€” Iain clearly outlines a handful of steps that you can take to improve font performance, each of which can have a benefit on its own, but when used together can lead to bigÂ wins.

ImageKit.io sponsor

Google Docs Shifting to Canvas Based Rendering â€” I think this could be a more substantial long term move than it appears at first as itâ€™s a whole new way to approach rendering content in the browser (and one more commonly associated with games and graphics, so far). Theyâ€™ve rigged up this demo of theÂ approach.

  • Here's the developer keynote from this year's Google I/O.
